snippet.title: Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#melonjourney #Indiedev #Steam 

Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories is out NOW on all platforms - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1074030/Melon_Journey_Bittersweet_Memories/

Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories is a story-exploration game about getting caught up in the outlandish happenings of a small town where melons are illegal. Silly and cute on the surface, but are things really as peaceful as they seem?
